author: fabiocos
body:
#### PR description:

This PR follows #43760 , adding another geometry scenario D107 = T32+C17+M11+I17+O9+F8 needed to parallelize the validation of the various new components of geometry (D107 = D98 + MTD I17 + Muons M11). Per request of @srimanob in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43760#issuecomment-1911926335

#### PR validation:

Code compiles using the standard procedures for creation of new geometry scenarios.
title: Geometry: add Phase2 scenarios D107 = T32+C17+M11+I17+O9+F8 and D108 = T35+C19+M11+I17+O9+F8
